This Tableau dashboard offers a comprehensive management overview, initially developed for a team tasked with monitoring the end-to-end operations of complex processes. The dashboard spans key areas such as customer management, tasks, projects, and finance, providing a high-level snapshot of performance and progress. Each section in the original dashboard was connected to a dedicated dashboard, enabling users to delve into specific details for more in-depth analysis.

Designed to enhance decision-making and improve visibility across various functions, this example was first demonstrated at the Copenhagen Tableau User Group. The example presented here showcases the front page, acting as a central hub for quick insights and easy navigation. Discover how this dashboard can bring clarity and efficiency to your management processes.
